events.name: UX Workshop - Full Day
events.description:
Industry experts in UX have kindly agreed to share their UX knowledge and enrich you via a Full-day UX Workshop. The workshop is a part of CoDE-2017 Summit. The tickets for the Workshop are priced at SGD 25 (includes lunch and coffee). 

What will you learn from the Workshop?
You can be a beginner in UX or simply a learning enthusiast. 

Workshop Topics: 
1. How to run "Design Sprint" from Borrys Hasian who is Google Expert in Product Design
2. "Lean Design in Practice" by Yan Lim, Design Lead from HOOQ 
3. You can choose any one between the following
- "When to use which User Research methods" from Sr UX Researcher, Yoel Krisnanda from UBER
OR,
- "Hands-on with Sketch tool" by Edison Chee, Designer at GovTech.
events.location: LEVEL3, 20 Pasir Panjang Rd, #03-22/24 Mapletree Business City, Singapore 117439
